entry.title: Ubuntu LTS Packaging?
entry.summary: In this conversation, Oliver reached out to Matt Corallo on April 12th, 2014 at 5:34 PM regarding an issue with his dynamically-linked-to-openssl builds. Matt responded by stating that the version of 0.9.1 was up to date and did not change anything for these builds. Oliver apologized for the trouble and expressed gratitude for Matt's assistance.
